CustomField.description: Difference between closed date and the last time the scrum team field was modified unless the scrum team field was modified after the bug was closed. This calculation excludes weekends.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c), null, IF( ( Closed__c == 1 && Closed_On__c > Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c), CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATE(1985,6,24),7), 0 , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,0,2,0,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 1 , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,1,2,1,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 2 , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,2,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 3 , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,3,4,3,5,3,6,4,0), 4 , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,5,4,6,4,0), 5 , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,0,2,1,3,2,4,3,5,4,6,0,0), 6 , CASE( MOD( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,0,2,0,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 999) + (FLOOR(( DATEVALUE(Closed_On__c) - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) )/7)*5) , 0) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Difference between closed date and the last time the scrum team field was modified unless the scrum team field was modified after the bug was closed. This calculation excludes weekends.
CustomField.label: Age With Scrum Team When Closed
